Summary: This super easy 3-ingredient brownie recipe is the only one you'll ever need! These brownies are rich and fudgy, the perfect solution for when you're craving chocolate!
Instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix together until well combined. Spread the very thick batter into a greased 8×8-inch baking dish.
Bake for 18 minutes or until a toothpick comes out with only a few fudgy crumbs. Cool and cut into bars.
Comments: Sherry says:Two of my favorite things-Nutella and Brownies!! These are great and with the nuts and caramel they are next level. Thanks for all your sharing on your site. Have a great day.
Chinese Food says:Cool recipe, I also love Brownies very much
Summer says:I’ve made a few times and love them! They’re perfect with ice cream, total gooey, deliciousness!
